mapper.select: select org_id, org_code, org_name, `sort`, parent_id, level, type, leader, phone, address, remark, email, tenant_id, create_time, update_time, `del_flag` from sys_org where sys_org.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and `del_flag` = 0
mapper.insert: insert into sys_org (org_id, org_code, org_name, `sort`, parent_id, level, type, leader, phone, address, email, tenant_id, remark) values (#{orgId}, #{orgCode}, #{orgName}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{level}, #{type}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{tenantId}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update sys_org set org_name=#{orgName},org_code=#{orgCode},`sort`=#{sort},parent_id=#{parentId},level=#{level},type=#{type},leader=#{leader},phone=#{phone},address=#{address}, email=#{email},remark=#{remark},update_time = now() where org_id = #{orgId}
